headline: General Dynamics (GD) Advances While Market Declines: Some Information for Investors
summary: General Dynamics (GD) concluded the recent trading session at $264.55, signifying a +0.6% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Time To Buy Defense Stocks, Analyst Says. Cathie Wood Is Buying.
summary: Citi says it's time to buy defense stocks. One name soars to lead the S&P 500. AeroVironment tumbles on earnings, outlook.

headline: General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) Declares Increased Quarterly Dividend of US$1.50 Per Share
summary: Last week, General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) announced a dividend increase, declaring a quarterly dividend of $1.50 per share, which may have aligned with a 5% share price rise over the same period. In a broader context, while the Dow Jones faced a tech-driven decline of 1.9% amid tariff concerns, General Dynamics experienced upward momentum, diverging from the broader market trend. Despite Wall Street's unease over potential tariffs, defense sector stocks like GD often attract investors seeking...

headline: General Dynamics Rewards Shareholders With 5.6% Dividend Hike
summary: GD hikes its quarterly dividend payout to $1.50 per share. This increase represents the company's 28th consecutive annual dividend hike.
